author: coheigea
msg: - Changed build.xml to pick up junit 3.8.2 instead of 4.8.1. Junit 4.8.1 is not compatible with JDK 1.4.x. Also, I added the xml-apis jar to the endorsed directory to fix a NPE.
- Updated maven plugin version in the pom, and changed the bundle plugin to export the version number.
- Keeping Junit 4.8.1 in the pom as I can't get the involved setup regarding endorsed libraries working with 3.8.2.

author: bimargulies
msg: Eliminate rolled-back JIRA from the release notes.
